dict.acceptation: 提出挑战，要求竞赛（或竞争）；驳斥；

sent.orig: Therefore it provides the crossrally fans an extraordinary challenge, a challenge to surpass the limits.
sent.trans: 因此它为越野爱好者提供了另类的挑战，跨越极限的挑战。

sent.orig: And this is not a challenge for government alone. It's a challenge for all of us.
sent.trans: 这不单单是对政府面临的挑战，也是全人类面临的挑战。

sent.orig: Results hypertonic saline challenge test was more sensitive than exercise challenge test (P 0.01) .
sent.trans: 结果同一哮喘患儿高渗盐水激发试验的敏感性显著高于运动激发试验(P0.01)。

sent.orig: But it was a very stupid challenge and it a challenge for a red card.
sent.trans: 但是这次犯规本身却是极其愚蠢的，这种冲撞是红牌动作。

sent.orig: Don't count the days-make the days count. Don't limit your challenge-challenge your limit.
sent.trans: 不要数著日子过，使每一天都变得很重要。不要局限你的挑战能力，挑战你的极限。
